name: website-optimisation-examples
description: Think of this as a playground to practice website optimisations

scripts.drop-db: echo "DROP DATABASE IF EXISTS website_optimisation_examples" | mysql -u root -h website_optimisation_examples_mysql -ppassword && exit 0
scripts.create-db: echo "CREATE DATABASE IF NOT EXISTS website_optimisation_examples CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci;" | mysql -u root -h website_optimisation_examples_mysql -ppassword && exit 0
scripts.apply-schema-and-data-and-changes: cat db/*.sql | mysql -u root -h website_optimisation_examples_mysql -ppassword website_optimisation_examples --default-character-set=utf8  && exit 0
scripts.rebuild-db: npm run drop-db && npm run create-db && npm run apply-schema-and-data-and-changes
scripts.css: cat public/css/reset.css public/css/mobile.css public/css/tablet.css public/css/desktop.css > public/css/main.css && node console/css.js compress
